abstract: HSBC, looking to shore up its books, has agreed to sell its Japanese private banking unit to Credit Suisse for an undisclosed amount.
snippet: HSBC, looking to shore up its books, has agreed to sell its Japanese private banking unit to Credit Suisse for an undisclosed amount.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — HSBC, looking to shore up its books, agreed on Wednesday to sell its Japanese private banking unit to Credit Suisse.

headline.main: HSBC to Sell Japanese Private Banking Unit to Credit Suisse
